ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: AvoidLowValueWrapperMethods
rule.message: Methods that only wrap a simple type check or trivial operation should be inlined to reduce unnecessary indirection
rule.description: Methods that only wrap simple operations (such as a single instanceof check) should be inlined. These wrapper methods add unnecessary indirection without providing value, making the code harder to understand and maintain.
